response.summary:
I'm an experienced professional with a strong background in DevOps, Linux servers, GCP (Google Cloud Platform), software development, CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment), and Terraform. With over 3 years in technical roles, I bring a unique combination of technical skills, including analytical problem-solving, effective communication, and a quick learning ability.

I thrive on learning and automating processes to tackle complex challenges. I excel in dynamic environments, where my analytical skills shine. Challenges are not obstacles but opportunities for growth and improvement. Continuous learning drives me forward.

Beyond technical expertise, my background in civil engineering and project management (over 4 years) equips me with effective coordination and supervision skills. I hold certifications in agile methodologies and scrum, enhancing my team collaboration and project management abilities. Staying updated on the latest trends ensures I bring fresh perspectives and innovative solutions.
response.skills: Prompt Engineering, GitHub, DevOps, monday.com, JavaScript, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Terraform, TypeScript, Bridges, Project Planning, Construction Site Management, Civil Engineering, Java, Linux, Docker Products, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Scrum, Git, PostgreSQL

profile_positions.description:
•	Provisioning and maintaining infrastructure using Terraform Cloud.
•	Deploying and automating applications on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including App Integration, CI/CD chatbots, workflows, Pub/Sub, cloud functions, and serverless integrations.
•	Designing and implementing microservices using Typescript and Node.js.
•	Implementing Serverless Architecture and API gateways.
•	Setting up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub and GitHub Actions.
•	Integrating and automating workflows with Monday and GCP.
•	Integrating with Salesforce, Apps Script, and Google Sheets/Docs API.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Setting up infrastructure in AWS, including S3, Amazon CloudFront, API Gateway, Amazon Route 53, RDS, and EC2.
•	Utilizing Docker for containerization, Jenkins for CI/CD, and working with cloud platforms such as DigitalOcean, IBM Cloud and Google Cloud.
•	Designing and creating databases, including table creation and advanced querying using PostgreSQL and MySQL.
•	Creating entity-relationship models (ERMs) and diagramming application infrastructure using Lucidchart.
•	Applying Bootstrap 5.2 for responsive and user-friendly design.
•	Designing and developing JavaScript applications for the education sector.
•	Designing and creating APIs using various frameworks in Node.js, such as Express.js.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Developing procedures for bridge construction using the methodology of successive cantilevers with advance carriages (Modular formwork traveller) and post-tensioned beams, as well as launching equipment (Launching gantry).
•	Coordinating and supervising the technical aspects of special teams during the planning and execution of bridge construction projects.
•	Designing metallic structures for bridge construction.
•	Directing and training a group of operators specializing in the construction of bridges with successive segments and post-tensioned beams.
•	Preparing budgets and quotes for bridge construction and post-tensioning projects.
profile_positions.title: Bridge Engineer (Technical and commercial)

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinate programming, resources, equipment, information and execution of projects.
• Preparation of budgets and work schedules.
• Monitor the progress of the project, analyze risks and opportunities for improvement.

 (Comunidad Hermanos Maristas, PTAR Cafam).
profile_positions.title: Civil Project Engineer
